entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has been imprisoned in Azkaban. He is emotional and scared of going back to the prison.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who tries to defend Hagrid's innocence.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff that Hagrid wants to set free.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison where Hagrid has been imprisoned.

relationships.description: Hagrid is scared of going back to Azkaban.
